attributes.action: Scrap unemployment benefits and replace them with a living wage, for work carried out in the local community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone who is unemployed can work within the community. Litter picking, cleaning graffiti, gardening and looking after open spaces. Even voluntary work in schools, prisons, hospitals and council offices and will receive a weekly wage that will top up their benefits.
 At the same time providing training and a sense of pride in themselves and community.
I myself am currently unemployed and finding it hard to find employment above the national minimum wage or any volunteering oppurtunities in my area.
